scripts.build: tsc && vite build && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: find dist/ -type l -delete 2>/dev/null || true && ln -sf dist/assets assets 2>/dev/null || true && ln -sf dist/fonts fonts 2>/dev/null || true && ln -sf dist/img img 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'âœ“ Symlinks created for DDEV access'
